summary: Completed frontend testing of i18n refactoring. Language switching works correctly between English, Spanish, and Chinese. Account dashboard (/mi-cuenta) displays translated content for all tabs (Wallet, Profile, Membership, Connections, Dependents, Capacities, Notifications). Admin dashboard loads correctly with English sidebar navigation. Found hardcoded Spanish text in landing page hero section that needs i18n translation.

ui_bugs.issue: Hardcoded Spanish text 'Bienvenido a ChiPi Link' and 'Tu Super App de comunidad y servicios' on lines 134-135 not using i18n translation
Hardcoded Spanish text 'Leer más' on line 166 not using i18n translation

issues: JavaScript runtime error overlay appears (webpack-dev-server-client-overlay) - non-blocking but visible to users. Error: 'Script error' and 'Failed to execute postMessage on Window: SVGAnimatedString object could not be cloned'

passed_tests: Admin dashboard loads at /admin after login with teck@koh.one credentials
Admin sidebar navigation displays English text (Dashboard, Unatienda, Orders, Users, Memberships, PinpanClub, Roles & Permissions, Administration, Integrations, Tickets/Chat)
/mi-cuenta page loads with all tabs: Wallet, Profile, Membership, Connections, Dependents, Capacities, Notifications
Language switcher changes UI language from English to Spanish correctly
Language switcher changes UI language from Spanish to Chinese correctly
Page title 'My Account' (English) -> 'Mi Cuenta' (Spanish) -> '我的账户' (Chinese) translations work
Tab labels translate correctly in all three languages
Wallet component displays translated labels (Balance USD, ChipiPoints, Total Value, Deposit, Convert)
Header navigation items translate correctly (Login, Register, My Orders, Administration)
action_items: Fix hardcoded Spanish text in /app/frontend/src/pages/SuperAppLanding.jsx lines 134-135 - replace with t('landing.hero.title') and t('landing.hero.subtitle')
Fix hardcoded Spanish text 'Leer más' in /app/frontend/src/pages/SuperAppLanding.jsx line 166 - replace with t('common.readMore') or similar
Investigate and fix the JavaScript runtime error appearing on /mi-cuenta page (SVGAnimatedString cloning issue)
critical_code_review_comments: AccountDashboard.jsx correctly uses useTranslation hook and t() function for all labels
WalletPage.jsx correctly uses useTranslation hook and t() function for all labels
ProfilePage.jsx correctly uses useTranslation hook and t() function for all labels
LanguageSelector.jsx correctly implements language switching with i18n.changeLanguage()
i18n/index.js correctly configures react-i18next with language detection and localStorage caching
Translation files (en.json, es.json, zh.json) have comprehensive translations for account module
SuperAppLanding.jsx has hardcoded Spanish text that bypasses i18n system - needs fix

success_rate.frontend: 95% (language switching and account pages work, minor hardcoded text issues)

i18n_system.language_switching: Working - English, Spanish, Chinese all switch correctly
i18n_system.translation_files: Present and comprehensive for en.json, es.json, zh.json

pages_tested.landing_page: Loads correctly, but has hardcoded Spanish text in hero section
pages_tested.mi_cuenta: Loads correctly with all 7 tabs translated

context_for_next_testing_agent: i18n refactoring is mostly complete. Language switching works for English/Spanish/Chinese. Account module (AccountDashboard, WalletPage, ProfilePage) fully translated. Main issue is hardcoded Spanish text in SuperAppLanding.jsx hero section (lines 134-135, 166) that needs to use t() function. Also a non-critical JavaScript error overlay appears on /mi-cuenta page related to SVGAnimatedString cloning.
